entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Smithers
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:37 PM PST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -1.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Smithers Airport 6:00 PM PST Monday 20 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -1.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -2.4°C
Wind: NW 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow ending before morning then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Clearing. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Clearing late in the morning. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 20 February 2023
